Name: Welcome To Graystone
About the game: Welcome to Graystone! Once believed to be the human race's next home, you are left alone after an asteroid hits the planet, leaving you to fend for yourself against other players with limited resources. Survive in an open-world environment, unfit for humans. Few resources remain, and must be rationed to survive. About Us Sue Bean Studios, LLC, is a completely veteran owned and operated Indie Game Dev studio, run by Grant Smith, a veteran of the 82nd Airborne Division. Our vision is to provide not only compelling content and gameplay, but provide a creative outlet and training for our fellow veterans and service-members. Features - Survive in a barren land - Manage resources to survive with little food, water, and heat - Craft weapons and tools to fend off the native robots and other players. - Choose your inventory before heading into the massive landscape. Band together with other players, or play for yourself.
